full_text: Small square comforter with an opening to put a teething ring. You can play on the visuals and make several cuddly toys with very contrasting colors. Or play with textures by making a cuddly toy in jersey, one in wheat or seedling stitch to bring a different feel. 1 ball for a cuddly toy. However, it is easy to adapt to your quantity of wool, you increase until you reach half of your wool before starting the decreases.
name: Ravelry: Doudou Carré pattern by Lau Demoizelle
